result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt: Status conference on January 10, 2023 at 10:00 am.

OFF THE RECORD / 11:54 AM Defendant Jerome Allan Isham Jr. in court.  Attorney Michael Arthur Kelsey in court for Jerome Allan Isham Jr.  Attorney Bruce Robert Poquette in court for State of Wisconsin.  Attny Kelsey request additional status.   State has no objection.
Status conference scheduled for January 10, 2023 at 10:00 am.

records.descr: Waiver of time limits for preliminary hearing

records.addlTxt:
2:04 PM Defendant Jerome Allen Isham Jr. in court.  Attorney Michael Arthur Kelsey in court for Jerome Allen Isham Jr.  Attorney Bruce Robert Poquette in court for State of Wisconsin. Court calls case and recites appearances. DEF received copy of criminal complaint in court on this date.  DEF verifies DOB and address.  Attny Kelsey recently appointed to cases.  Attny Kelsey indicates DEF waives time limits for preliminary hearing, and has received global resolution.
Status conference scheduled for October 5, 2022 at 11:30 am.
Scheduling conference on July 6, 2022 at 02:00 pm.
Attorney Michael Kelsey  (DEFENDANT TO REPAY THE COURT AT THE RATE OF $60.00/MONTH)

11:59 AM Defendant Jerome Allen Isham Jr. appeared by video, in custody.  Attorney Kenneth Sortedahl appeared by video for State of Wisconsin. Court calls case, recites appearances and reviews court record.   Court makes record on status of attorney.  DEF filed Court Appointed paperwork, Court indicates JA working to find attorney.   Court addresses DEF regarding preliminary hearing.   DEF requests to have attorney present for Preliminary hearing.  Court finds good cause to extend time limits for preliminary hearing, to obtain attorney for DEF.
Status conference scheduled for May 24, 2022 at 02:30 pm.
Status conference on May 24, 2022 at 02:30 pm.

records.descr: Pet for appointment counsel,affidavit of indigency

records.addlTxt:
11:47 AM Defendant Jerome Allen Isham Jr. appeared by video, in custody.  Attorney Bruce Robert Poquette in court for State of Wisconsin.   Attny Gabriel Pollak (Special Appearance) appeared by video.  Court calls case and recites appearances.   Attny Pollak indicates does not apply.   DEF indicates has attempted to contact attorneys.  Court gives the DEF the attorney colloquy.   DEF waives time limits for preliminary hearing, and requests to have attorney present.   Court addresses DEF.   DEF indicates to complete court appointed attorney paperwork today, court request jail to accommodate.
Preliminary hearing and Arraignment scheduled for May 20, 2022 at 11:45 am.
Preliminary hearing and Arraignment on May 20, 2022 at 11:45 am.
Preliminary hearing on May 6, 2022 at 11:15 am.

11:31 AM Defendant Jerome Allen Isham Jr. appeared by video from in custody in Sawyer County Jail, with Alysja Otten (special appearance) appearing by video. Attorney Bruce Robert Poquette appeared for State of Wisconsin. Court calls case and recites appearances. Discussion on PD eligibility of DEF.  Court has discussion with DEF on holding initial appearance.  Atty Otten indicates DEF does not qualify for PD appointment.  Court gives the DEF the attorney colloquy. DEF requests to proceed with INIT. DEF verifies DOB and address.  Defendant advised of rights/penalties, acknowledges receipt of complaint.  Court enters NG plea on behalf of DEF.  Court sets PRELIM for 5/6/22 at 11:15AM and instructs DEF to complete application for court appointed attorney.
Preliminary hearing scheduled for May 6, 2022 at 11:15 am.
$1500.00 CASH - NO CONTACT WITH 14454 W COUNTY HWY E, HAYWARD, WI 54843

DEF Jerome A Isham Jr. in court, appearing by video from custody in the Sawyer County Jail. Bruce Poquette, District Attorney, appeared in person for the State of WI.    Court calls case and recites appearances. State indicates police report arrived at office at 3:00 pm 04/25/2022.  State requests continuance.  Court address Defendant regarding Attorney - contact Public Defender's office.  Court resets for Initial appearance on 04/29/2022 at 11:00 am. 

$1500 Cash Bond Continues.
$1500.00 -   NO CONTACT WITH 14454 W COUNTY HWY E, HAYWARD, WI 54843

Defendant, Jerome A. Isham Jr. in court, appearing by video from custody in the Sawyer County Jail, with Atty Alysja Otten (special appearance). Assistant District Attorney Kenneth Sortedahl,  appeared by video for the State of WI.   Court calls case and recites appearances.  DEF verifies DOB and Address.  DEF does not qualify for public defender appointment.  Court finds probable cause.  State makes bond recommendation.  Atty argues bond.  Court sets bond. Court gives the DEF the attorney colloquy. Court sets INIT for 04-26-2022 at 8:30AM.  

$1500.00 Cash Bond Set - NO CONTACT WITH 14454 W COUNTY HWY E, HAYWARD, WI 54843
